snippet: To the Editor:    I am troubled that one of your readers was left with the impression that because of a Federal Bureau of Investigation warning, I screen all contributions from Asian-American donors (letter, March 17). The fact is, I agree that lu...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I am troubled that one of your readers was left with the impression that because of a Federal Bureau of Investigation warning, I screen all contributions from Asian-American donors (letter, March 17). The fact is, I agree that lumping all Asian-Americans into a pool of possibly suspect donors is repugnant. Asian-Americans have every right to contribute to the political process and to be taken at face value like any other American.
abstract: Sen Dianne Feinstein letter disputes Laura E Wong March 17 letter contending that because of FBI warning, Feinstein screens all contributions from Asian-American donors
